item.title: How to be a developed society
item.description: When the IMF said it will take years for India to catch up to 0.25*US GDP, the hell broke loose on certain corner of social media. The real soft power of US is convincing us that it’s the only country for others to look up to. But there are countless other countries to learn from. Also, the GDP is not the only metric to go with. The young mind out of college is fearless.

item.title: Analog Clock
item.description: First we started with a circle. The dial is composed of a bigger circle and a smaller one - a center point. With the dial is in place, next step is to add arms of the clock. The end result should have 3 arms - depicting hours, minutes and seconds. To have quicker feedback we started with seconds arm. Drawing the radius solves the initial position of seconds arm.
